name: Help.exe (Ps1 Dev)
description: A Game That Was Discontinued Because Of A Bug, We Tried Everything To Take It Out But It Didn't Work, We Called The Bug "Hat Kid" The Game Originally Would Be Released For PS1 And Windows 95 The Game Would Set In A Forest, Because Of That You Can Find A Tree, But Only One ... Because It Has Been Discontinued The Game Is Still In The Pre-Alpha Phase.
